Segment.name: SHI
Segment.comment: To specify information concerning securities held by an entity

Field.name: SecurityHoldingTypeCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the type of security that is held.

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: ProductTransferTypeCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the type of product transfer

Field.name: StatusCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the status of a business transaction, such as a claim, policy, real estate, or securities transaction

SyntaxNote.name: R0203
SyntaxNote.comment: At least one of SHI02 or SHI03 is required.
